channel.title: CVE Feed for realmag777 -- WPCS - WordPress Currency Switcher
channel.description: The latest CVEs for realmag777 -- WPCS - WordPress Currency Switcher

item.title: CVE-2021-20780|2024-08-03T17:53:22.382Z -- realmag777 -- wpcs%20-%20wordpress%20currency%20switcher
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPCS - WordPress Currency Switcher 1.1.6 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
